title: Europe's Recovery Programs
itunes:author: Professor Luis Garicano, Professor Stefanie Stantcheva, Professor Nikos Vettas
description: Contributor(s): Professor Luis Garicano, Professor Stefanie Stantcheva, Professor Nikos Vettas | These programs differ in ambition, as well as in the scope of policies. This discussion highlights key features of the French, Greek and EU programs, while also focusing on policies to reduce inequality.
